oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Iron-catalyzed aerobic oxidative aromatization of 1,3,5-trisubstituted pyrazolines
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ANANTHNAG, GS
ADHIKARI, A
BALAKRISHNA, MS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pyrazoles
Iron(III) catalyst
Aerobic oxidation
Aromatization
HANTZSCH 1,4-DIHYDROPYRIDINES
NITROGEN-HETEROCYCLES
FACILE SYNTHESIS
OXIDIZING-AGENT
DEHYDROGENATION
ACID
PHENOLS
KETONES
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple and high yielding method for the synthesis of tri-substituted pyrazoles via iron(III) catalyzed aerobic oxidative aromatization of pyrazolines has been reported. The process demonstrates a variety of functional group tolerance. (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
